text: @WHOSEARO @WHO @WHOThailand @WHOTimorLeste @WHOMaldives @WHOIndonesia @WHOSriLanka Request for clarification from @WHO @WHOSEARO: while antibiotics won’t treat the underlying COVID-19 virus, antibiotics *are* used to treat bacterial pneumonia—one of several potential symptoms individuals have exhibited as a consequence of contracting the coronavirus, correct?

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
